lead_paragraph: The stock payouts will vest after three years, only if the bank meets certain performance goals, Wells Fargo said.
snippet: The stock payouts will vest after three years, only if the bank meets certain performance goals, Wells Fargo said.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Pays $25 Million in Stock Bonuses
headline.seo: Wells Fargo Pays $25 Million in Stock Bonuses
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Pays 4 Executives $25 Million in Stock Bonuses, Not Cash
